children.label: find
description: Find a set of files given some filters.
signature: (args: { kind?: string | string[] | undefined; status?: string | string[] | undefined; extension?: string | string[] | undefined; name?: string | string[] | undefined; meta?: M | undefined; } &

children.label: args
description: - File filters
signature: { kind?: string | string[] | undefined; status?: string | string[] | undefined; extension?: string | string[] | undefined; name?: string | string[] | undefined; meta?: M | undefined; } &

children.label: bulkDelete
description: Bulk a delete a set of files given their IDs.
signature: ) => Promise<{ succeeded: string[]; failed?: [id: string, reason: string][] | undefined; }>

children.label: args
description: - Bulk delete args

children.label: create
description: Create a new file object with the provided metadata.
signature: (args: { name: string; meta?: M | undefined; alt?: string | undefined; mimeType?: string | undefined; kind: string; } &

children.label: args
description: - create file args
signature: { name: string; meta?: M | undefined; alt?: string | undefined; mimeType?: string | undefined; kind: string; } &

children.label: delete
description: Delete a file object and all associated share and content objects.

children.label: args
description: - delete file args

children.label: getById
description: Get a file object by ID.

children.label: args
description: - get file by ID args

children.label: list
description: List all file objects, of a given {@link FileKindBrowser}.
signature: (args: { kind: string; status?: string | string[] | undefined; extension?: string | string[] | undefined; name?: string | string[] | undefined; meta?: M | undefined; } &

children.label: args
description: - list files args
signature: { kind: string; status?: string | string[] | undefined; extension?: string | string[] | undefined; name?: string | string[] | undefined; meta?: M | undefined; } &

children.label: update
description: Update a set of of metadata values of the file object.
signature: (args: { id: string; kind: string; name?: string | undefined; meta?: M | undefined; alt?: string | undefined; } &

children.label: args
description: - update file args
signature: { id: string; kind: string; name?: string | undefined; meta?: M | undefined; alt?: string | undefined; } &

children.label: upload
description: Stream the contents of the file to Kibana server for storage.
signature: (args: { id: string; body: unknown; kind: string; abortSignal?: AbortSignal | undefined; contentType?: string | undefined; selfDestructOnAbort?: boolean | undefined; } &

children.label: args
description: - upload file args
signature: { id: string; body: unknown; kind: string; abortSignal?: AbortSignal | undefined; contentType?: string | undefined; selfDestructOnAbort?: boolean | undefined; } &

children.label: download
description: Stream a download of the file object's content.
signature: (args: { fileName?: string | undefined; id: string; kind: string; } &

children.label: args
description: - download file args
signature: { fileName?: string | undefined; id: string; kind: string; } &

children.label: getDownloadHref
description:
Get a string for downloading a file that can be passed to a button element's
href for download.

children.label: args
description: - get download URL args

children.label: share
description: Share a file by creating a new file share instance.
signature: (args: { name?: string | undefined; validUntil?: number | undefined; fileId: string; kind: string; } &

children.label: args
description: - File share arguments
signature: { name?: string | undefined; validUntil?: number | undefined; fileId: string; kind: string; } &

children.label: unshare
description: Delete a file share instance.

children.label: args
description: - File unshare arguments

children.label: getShare
description: Get a file share instance.

children.label: args
description: - Get file share arguments

children.label: listShares
description:
List all file shares. Optionally scoping to a specific
file.

children.label: args
description: - Get file share arguments

children.label: getFileKind
description: Get a file kind

children.label: id
description: The id of the file kind

interfaces.label: FileImageMetadata
description:
Set of metadata captured for every image uploaded via the file services'
public components.

children.label: blurhash
description: The blurhash that can be displayed while the image is loading

children.label: width
description: Width, in px, of the original image

children.label: height
description: Height, in px, of the original image

interfaces.label: FileJSON
description: Attributes of a file that represent a serialised version of the file.

children.label: id
description: Unique file ID.

children.label: created
description: ISO string of when this file was created

children.label: updated
description: ISO string of when the file was updated

children.label: name
description: File name.

children.label: mimeType
description: MIME type of the file's contents.

children.label: size
description: The size, in bytes, of the file content.

children.label: extension
description: The file extension (dot suffix).

children.label: meta
description:
A consumer defined set of attributes.

Consumers of the file service can add their own tags and identifiers to
a file using the "meta" object.

children.label: alt
description: Use this text to describe the file contents for display and accessibility.

children.label: fileKind
description:
A unique kind that governs various aspects of the file. A consumer of the
files service must register a file kind and link their files to a specific
kind.

children.label: status
description:
The current status of the file.

See {@link FileStatus} for more details.

children.label: user
description: User data associated with this file
signature: { name?: string | undefined; id?: string | undefined; } | undefined

children.label: id
description: Unique file kind ID

children.label: allowedMimeTypes
description: The MIME type of the file content.

children.label: maxSizeBytes
description:
Max file contents size, in bytes, enforced for this file kind in the upload
component.

interfaces.label: FileShareJSON
description: Attributes of a file that represent a serialised version of the file.

children.label: id
description: Unique ID share instance

children.label: created
description: ISO timestamp the share was created

children.label: validUntil
description: Unix timestamp (in milliseconds) of when this share expires

children.label: name
description: A user-friendly name for the file share

children.label: fileId
description: The ID of the file this share is linked to

misc.label: BaseFileMetadata
description:
File metadata fields are defined per the ECS specification:

https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/ecs/current/ecs-file.html

Custom fields are named according to the custom field convention: "CustomFieldName".
signature: { name?: string | undefined; mime_type?: string | undefined; created?: string | undefined; size?: number | undefined; hash?: { [hashName: string]: string | undefined; md5?: string | undefined; sha1?: string | undefined; sha256?: string | undefined; sha384?: string | undefined; sha512?: string | undefined; ssdeep?: string | undefined; tlsh?: string | undefined; } | undefined; user?: { name?: string | undefined; id?: string | undefined; } | undefined; extension?: string | undefined; Alt?: string | undefined; Updated?: string | undefined; Status?:

misc.label: FileCompression
description: Supported file compression algorithms

misc.label: FileMetadata
description: Extra metadata on a file object specific to Kibana implementation.

misc.label: FileShare
description: Data stored with a file share object
signature: { created: string; token: string; name?: string | undefined; valid_until: number; }

misc.label: FileShareJSONWithToken
description: A version of the file share with a token included.
